title: Responsive Layout with Sidebar
description: In this lab, we will be exploring the world of CSS programming. The main objective of this lab is to provide hands-on experience with creating a responsive layout with a sidebar. By the end of this lab, you will have a better understanding of how to use display: grid and minmax() properties to create an effective and visually appealing layout.

meta.title: Responsive Layout with Sidebar | CSS Programming Tutorial
meta.description: Explore the world of CSS programming and learn how to create a responsive layout with a sidebar. Hands-on experience with grid layout and minmax() properties.
meta.keywords: CSS, programming, responsive layout, sidebar, grid layout, minmax
